title: Sacrifice
description: Kane has lost everything, including his soul. Instead, a demon's soul houses in his own body, longing for chaos and destruction. Everything that keeps him on a path separate from utter chaos is his love for Janine. However, will that love be strong enough after he tastes blood? Murder? Devouring other souls to make him stronger? How much do the people around him have to sacrifice in order to keep him from bringing utter disaster upon the world?
author: A.K. Denic
